name: h3
description: Introducing the 2025 Demarini Voodoo One Drop 8 USSSA Baseball Bat, a game-changer for young athletes seeking top-tier performance. This USSSA certified bat, featuring a balanced swing feel, boasts a 2 3/4 inch barrel diameter engineered from an X14 Alloy for unmatched durability and premium pop. Its eye-catching red colorway with white accents ensures players stand out on the field, while the Tracer End Cap enhances bat speed for those crucial moments at the plate. With a massive barrel and easy-swinging design, this bat offers a hot performance right out of the wrapper, requiring zero break-in period for immediate impact. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
